name: Resistance Alliance
description:
This is a game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

What to do when a squadron of spaceships come to attack your planetary system? Going alone is a suicide mission, but allying yourself with other planets that can offer more ships to fight, you may have a chance to win the battle.

The more allied ships helping you, the stronger you get, your shield gets tougher and your shots get faster. Will it be enough to stop the squad from destroying the entire system?
